name: Slippage
description:
Slippage is a fast paced, chaotically confusing shooter where you control 4 shooters, dropping in and out of their dimension at any time. Let's hope you weren't in a tricky spot when you left, because you'll still be there next time.

This is my submission for the Brackeys GameJam 2021.2 and, incidentally, my first game. Hope you enjoy it and comment below what score you got!
